sources.description:
Stars: Russell Hayden, Inez Cooper, Douglas Fowley
Director: B. Reeves Eason

Saddle up for a thrilling 1946 cowboy western adventure starring Russell Hayden, Inez Cooper, and Douglas Fowley, under the dynamic direction of B. Reeves Eason. This action-packed classic follows a courageous Canadian Mountie who goes undercover as an outlaw to take down a ruthless gang of gold mine claim jumpers. With danger lurking in every shadow of the wild frontier, it‚Äôs a gripping tale of justice, loyalty, and bravery beneath the wide-open skies of the North.

Perfect for fans of classic westerns, vintage cinema, and old-school cowboy films, this movie delivers everything you love‚Äîgunfights, gritty heroes, and unforgettable characters. Whether you‚Äôre a longtime Russell Hayden enthusiast or discovering Inez Cooper and Douglas Fowley for the first time, this hidden gem from the golden age of westerns deserves a spot on your watchlist.

Presented by PizzaFLIX, this vintage gem is a must-watch for fans of Cowboy Westerns, 1940s Westerns, and Russell Hayden films. With strong performances from Inez Cooper and Douglas Fowley, and tight direction from B. Reeves Eason, it‚Äôs a forgotten treasure from Hollywood‚Äôs golden era.

metadata.Plot: Thompson is after Elliot's gold mine. If he can keep it inactive for one year he can file on it. But when his men kill a mountie, Tim is sent to investigate. Posing as an outlaw, he hopes to trap the gang by making a deal with them. But he is in trouble when his true identity becomes known.
metadata.Writer: James Oliver Curwood, Arthur V. Jones
metadata.Actors: Russell Hayden, Inez Cooper, Douglas Fowley
